text: Squires of San Quentin is a 1978 American short documentary film produced by J. Gary Mitchell. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. \- The film was shot in San Quentin State Prison and depicts "The Squires", inmates who attempt to convince troubled children to avoid criminal behavior. ==References== ==External links== *Squires of San Quentin at the J. Gary Mitchell Film Company * Category:1978 documentary films Category:1978 short films Category:1978 films Category:American documentary films Category:American films Category:Documentary films about incarceration in the United States Category:English-language films Category:Films set in San Quentin State Prison Category:Films shot in San Quentin, California Category:Short documentary films
title: Squires of San Quentin
